items.content_html: Python implementation of a tool for decrypting and encrypting sensitive data in Grafana, specifically addressing the vulnerabilities associated with CVE-2021-43798. Grafana encrypts all data source passwords using the AES algorithm with the secret_key found in the defaults.ini configuration file.
items.title: sazzad1337/Grafana-CVE-2021-43798: Python implementation of a tool for decrypting and encrypting sensitive data in Grafana, specifically addressing the vulnerabilities associated with CVE-2021-43798. Grafana encrypts all data source passwords using the AES algorithm with the secret_key found in the defaults.ini configuration file.
